brief.brief: The method that is used to calculate the expiration time of an Operational Level Agreement (OLA) or Underpinning Contract (UC) process target.

detail.detail: This calculation is based on assignment groups. You can choose one of the following methods:

Total time for all assignment groups: The process target duration is counted together for all the groups that are assigned to handle the record. The counting does not stop when the record is reassigned among different groups.

Total time for each assignment group: The process target duration is counted separately for each group that is assigned to handle the record. The counting stops when the record is reassigned to another group and it continues when the record is assigned back.

Time for the current assignment group: The process target duration is counted for the current group that is assigned to handle the record. The counting starts when the record is assigned and it restarts each time when the record is reassigned, including the situation in which the record is reassigned back to the original group.
